txt.en: 'With most of its occupants now gone, a few brave souls are using the Paths of the Dead to traverse between here and Rohan. The majority are now making it through, a welcome departure from even just a week ago. However, some are not so lucky.\n\n'I have heard about a group of Ruthless Dead watching over the path from the Shadow-watch, an overlook within Kêr Izel. Find them and disperse them. Kêr Izel is within the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of here.'
Golusel is in Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel will be pleased to hear the Paths of the Dead should be safer for a period of time.
Defeat Ruthless Banner-bearers at the Shadow-watch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
There are reports of powerful Ruthless Dead preying on those brave enough to now use the Paths of the Dead.
Defeated Ruthless Banner-bearers at the Shadow-watch ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'They will return, you cannot defeat an Oath-breaker, you can only quiet it for a time. But still, a time is better than not at all.'

The Shadow-watch is within Kêr Izel, in the Paths of the Dead, far to the north of Dol Amroth.\n\nGolusel asked you to venture to the Paths of the Dead and disperse some Ruthless Dead who are preying on travellers from an overlook.
